text: Nicola Peltz (born January 9, 1995) is an American actress. She played Katara in the 2010 movie The Last Airbender, directed by M. Night Shyamalan. ==Life and career== Peltz was born in Westchester County, New York, the daughter of billionaire businessman Nelson Peltz.Vancouversun.com (Nicola Peltz) She has four older brothers, two younger brothers, and a sister. When she was younger, she attended Rye Country Day School in Rye, New York and from there went to Windward School in White Plains, New York. Her most recent school is the Professional Children's School in Manhattan, New York. She played Katara in the movie The Last Airbender. She was also in the 2006 movie Deck the Halls, playing Mackenzie, and Harold in 2008, where she was cast as Becki. She made a brief appearance in Miley Cyrus's "7 Things" music video. On 27 March 2010, she made an appearance at the Kids Choice Awards 2010 on Nickelodeon, and also appeared at the 2010 MTV Movie Awards, along with The Last Airbender co-star Jackson Rathbone, to present a trailer for The Last Airbender. == Filmography == Year Movie Role Notes 2006 Deck the Halls Mackenzie 2008 Harold Becki 2008 Righteous Kill Lynn 2010 The Last Airbender Katara 2014 Transformers 4 Tessa ==References== == Other websites == *Miss Nicola Peltz , The Official Fansite of Nicola Peltz * Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rye, New York Category:People from White Plains, New York
title: Nicola Peltz
